name: Hotel La Fuente De La Higuera

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As many other reviews have noted, this is a special property full of top level amenities, beautiful rooms in a gorgeous setting - everything one expects for a premium dollar. What sets Hotel La Fuente De La Higuera apart to me is the service and attention to detail provided by Pom and Christina and their staff. Prior to our trip, we received several emails from the team ensuring our needs were met and once we arrived, we were greeted by Javier and offered a lovely glass of fresh squeezed orange juice. A quick tour around the property ended with the invitation to enter our room (#4) and it was all we expected - classic, understated and privileged. The two very short days we spent included a delicious lunch and dinner (the seafood salad was incredible!!!), some down time by the comfortable pool and a driving tour of the white villages as recommended by the very lovely Gina. In all our experiences, staff were gracious and helpful without being intrusive. Our departure was a treat as we had a chance to visit with Christina and chat about our stay, and when I sent a followup email upon our return home to provide some forgotten feedback, her response was immediate and welcoming. I highly recommend a stay at La Fuente. Magical memories will be made here.
reviews.title: Its the little things that make this place so special

reviews.text: Had a very relaxing time at this wonderful farmhouse outside ronda. Very big nice bedroom with huge balcony to relax on. Pool is perfect and very much enjoyed drinks in the terrace. We were well looked after by javier and will definitely be back.

reviews.text: Located just outside the historic town of Ronda, Hotel La Fuenta was previously an old abandoned olive mill which has been rebuilt / re-developed beyond anyone's belief (ask to see the original photographs!) - It is an outstanding picturesque location and has a wonderful ambiance - food and service was simply first class, as were our hosts, Poom and Christina (?) are very warm and friendly and always remember your name(s)! - recommend you request a room with a balcony..... if one is available.

reviews.text: It is probably not the place to go to if you want entertainment but I can thoroughly recommend it for a relaxing holiday or a touring base with a personal touch.We will be back soon!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you want to have a 5 star relaxed, informal but top class New Year or a few days stay near Ronda, then La Fuente ought to be top of your list. Excellent accommodation, fine food and wine in a lovely setting with attentive staff and the irrepressible Pom (the owner) providing effortless service. We have recommended this hotel to others and will be back soon ourselves. We run a self catering converted Barn in Cornwall, UK so we know what discerning guests value most.

description: Imagine a small luxury suite hotel run along the lines of a laid-back country house party thrown by friends. In a renovated rural olive oil mill, with beautifull Ronda within sight, where traditional Spanish architecture meets post-modern design and eclectic furnishing. A short drive from cosmopolitan Ronda but with all the country house comforts to tempt you to just siesta by the pool or on the lawn.
